The 51-year-old congressman's future has been the subject of speculation since he resigned the No. 3 GOP House leadership slot after easily winning in November for a sixth term from his eastern Indiana district. I am convinced he is now going to run for governor, said Mike McDaniel , a former state Republican chairman. A Cambridgeshire academic has been asked by the government to re-write parts of the school history syllabus. Dr Sean Lang helped found the Better History Group and is BBC Radio Cambridgeshire's Dr History. I, and various others, think that students are being required to know a lot less now than they used to, said the Anglia Ruskin University lecturer.
